topComments.author: Glenn Smith (Smitty Nuc-Guy)
topComments.comment: This was a great outing. The Safari wagon takes you up close and personal to giraffes and camels. Got some great photographs feeding the giraffes. Their pet camel is a big puppy dog who wants to be petted on the nose. Highly recommend the vehicle tour. $119 per person.

topComments.author: Brutally Honest in Florida
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Tivemos um tempo incr√≠vel, o guia era muito experiente. O Sr. Salisbury √© um grande homem que saiu da aposentadoria para acolher e cuidar desses belos animais. Sugiro uma visita ao parque, adoraria faz√™-lo novamente, mas sem minha neta de 4 anos, ela estava um pouco quente e isso a deixou mal-humorada no final. Dou-lhe um A++ para o passeio de camelo.  (Original) Had a awesome time,the guide was very knowledgeable. Mr. Salisbury is a great man to come out of retirement to take in and care for these beautiful animals. I suggest a visit to the park, I would love to do it again but without my 4yr old granddaughter, she was a  little hot and it made her cranky towards the end. I give it an A++ for the camelback tour.

topComments.author: Carlamarie B
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Aqui est√£o apenas algumas fotos de todos os animais incr√≠veis que voc√™ ver√° e aprender√° no Giraffe Ranch. Lex e Elena s√£o √≥timos e Lex foi quem nos levou em nossa turn√™. Seu amor genu√≠no por seu rancho e todos os seus animais mostra alto e claro. Ele √© uma riqueza de informa√ß√µes, ent√£o tome notas! Homem muito mundano para dizer o m√≠nimo. Aprendemos muito e fizemos muitas perguntas que Lex ficou feliz em responder. Foi t√£o divertido e t√£o educativo. Vale cada centavo e mais alguns. Vou novamente e fazer o passeio de camelo em seguida! Fizemos isso para o anivers√°rio de 81 anos da minha m√£e e descobrimos que ele tinha uma senhora com mais de 100 anos fazendo o passeio de camelo !! Minha m√£e diz que vai fazer pelo seu 85¬∫ lol!! Eu a vivi minha vida inteira e acabei de saber sobre esse lugar no meu programa de r√°dio matinal favorito. Lamento n√£o saber antes. Eu adoraria ter levado meu pai que tinha um amor enorme pelos animais. Escusado ser√° dizer que estou grato por ter experimentado isso com a m√£e. Eu avalio esta experi√™ncia de vida como o melhor dos diamantes. Triplo incolor excelente!!! ‚ù§üòò  (Original) Here are just a few shots of all the amazing animals you will see and learn about at the Giraffe Ranch. Lex and Elena are so great and Lex was who took us on our tour. His genuine love for his ranch and all his animals shows loud and clear. He is a wealth of information so take notes! Very worldly man to say the least. We learned so much and asked many questions that Lex was happy to answer. It was so fun and so educational. Worth every cent and then some. I will go again and take the camel tour next! We did this for my moms 81st bday and learned that he had a lady over 100 do the camel back tour!! My mom says she will do it for her 85th lol!! I've lived her my whole life and just learned about this place on my favorite morning radio show.  I'm sorry I did not know earlier. I'd of love to have taken my father who had a huge love for the animals. Needless to say im grateful I got to experience this with mom. I rate this life experience like the best of diamonds. Colorless triple excellent!!! ‚ù§üòò

topComments.author: pivolopez
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Esta foi absolutamente uma experi√™ncia incr√≠vel! Eles cuidam dessa instala√ß√£o e realmente se preocupam com esses animais. Foi um passeio drive-thru com o guia pelo r√°dio. Fizemos outros passeios como este e a qualidade do passeio e das informa√ß√µes do guia (que trabalhou em todo o mundo e √© professor adjunto) √© inigual√°vel. N√≥s tamb√©m fizemos a alimenta√ß√£o do l√™mure depois (US$ 35) e foi T√ÉO LEGAL. Eles t√™m outras op√ß√µes de pacotes (passeio de Segway / passeio de camelo / guiado) e outras op√ß√µes de alimenta√ß√£o para explorar tamb√©m. H√° outro local em Lakeland que √© 5x o tamanho e iremos revisar isso em breve tamb√©m! VALE MUITO O CUSTO!!!  (Original) This was absolutely an amazing experience!  They take pristine care of this facility and really care about these animals.  It was a drive-thru tour with the guide over the radio.  We have taken other tours like this and the quality of the tour and information from the guide (who has worked all over the world and is an adjunct professor) is 2nd to none.  We also did the lemur feeding afterwards ($35) and it was SO COOL.  They have other package options (Segway tour/camel tour/driven) and other feeding options to explore as well.  There is another location in Lakeland that is 5x the size and we will go and review that soon too!  VERY MUCH WORTH THE COST!!!

topComments.author: Jessica Franco
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Excelente aventura! Fizemos o passeio de camelo. Os guias eram bem informados e voc√™ podia ver os animais muito mais de perto do que em um zool√≥gico. Eles tamb√©m foram muito abertos sobre a origem de cada animal e seus esfor√ßos de conserva√ß√£o.  (Original) Excellent adventure! We did the camel tour. The guides were knowledgeable and you got to see the animals way closer than you would at a zoo. They were also very open about where each animal came from and their conservation efforts.

topComments.author: Candice Edwards
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) N√≥s tivemos um tempo incr√≠vel! √â muito educativo, mas tamb√©m muito divertido! Voc√™ pode adicionar experi√™ncias como alimentar l√™mures ou porquinhos-da-√≠ndia ou um mini passeio de camelo. Voc√™ pode alimentar as girafas e se aproximar delas. Voc√™ tamb√©m pode adicionar a experi√™ncia do rinoceronte, onde voc√™ o alimenta e d√° banho. Os propriet√°rios s√£o muito am√°veis ‚Äã‚Äãe extremamente experientes. N√£o podemos esperar para voltar. Eles fazem muitos trabalhos de resgate e reabilita√ß√£o e tamb√©m est√£o ajudando com programas de cria√ß√£o de animais amea√ßados de extin√ß√£o. Voc√™ pode dizer que os animais s√£o muito bem cuidados e amados e que esta √© uma verdadeira paix√£o para eles. Eu diria que este √© um √≥timo lugar para crian√ßas de 5+, qualquer mais jovem pode ser um pouco pr√°tico ou ficar entediado, mas eu recomendo!  (Original) We had an amazing time! It's very educational but also a lot of fun! You can add on experiences like feeding the lemurs or guinea pigs or a mini camel ride. You get to feed giraffes and get up close with them. You can also add on the rhino experience where you feed and bathe him. The owners are very sweet and extremely knowledgeable. We can't wait to go back. They do a lot of rescue and rehab work and are also helping with endangered animals breeding programs. You can tell the animals are really well taken care of and loved and that this is a real passion for them. I would say this is a great place for kids 5+, any younger might be a little handsy or get bored but I highly recommend!

topComments.author: Mike T
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Absolutamente m√£os para baixo a melhor experi√™ncia de sempre. As palavras podem descrever o qu√£o incr√≠vel este lugar era e os propriet√°rios eram t√£o agrad√°veis. Eu tinha minha av√≥ comigo que tem problemas de mobilidade e eles realmente ajudaram com ela e se envolveram com ela e fizeram um dia muito especial.  (Original) Absolutely hands down the best experience ever. Words can describe how amazing this place was and the owners where so nice . I had my grandmother with me who has mobility issues and they really helped with her and engaged with her and made for a very special day .

topComments.author: Anna S.
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Lindo lugar! N√≥s nos divertimos muito alimentando girafas, l√™mures e lontras! O lugar √© limpo e bem cuidado. Guia de turismo muito experiente.  (Original) Beautiful place! We had so much fun feeding giraffes, lemurs and otters! The place is clean and taken care of. Very knowledgeable tour guide.

topComments.author: James Nienhaus
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Tivemos um tempo maravilhoso, pagar mais para alimentar os l√™mures vale 100% a pena. Todos os animais pareciam felizes e bem cuidados. Vale a hora de carro de Orlando!  (Original) We had an amazing time, paying extra to feed the lemurs is 100% worth it. All of the animals seemed happy and well cared for. Worth the hour drive from Orlando!

topComments.author: Jeremy B549
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Isso valeu cada centavo! Tantos animais e voc√™ fica muito mais perto do que um zool√≥gico! Mal posso esperar para fazer de novo. Voc√™ pode dizer que os animais s√£o bem amados e bem cuidados. Foi uma experi√™ncia muito legal e aprendemos muito com o conforto do nosso carro!  (Original) It was worth every penny! So many animals and you get so much closer than a zoo! I can‚Äôt wait to do it again. You can tell the animals are well loved and cared for. Such a cool experience and we learned a lot from the comfort of our car!

topComments.author: Jared Wilbur
topComments.comment: Incredible park with a huge variety of animals! The owner previously ran Tampa's Lowry Park Zoo, and his experience definitely showed in the quality of the habitats, and the health/temperament of the animals. The staff was very knowledgeable and friendly.  We did the lemur feeding experience, which was awesome, but I'd avoid bringing children younger than 5 unless they're very well-behaved. They're very strict on hand-washing, safety, and hygiene (as they should be), and the well-being of the animals is priority #1. Our nephew (3) refused to wash his hands, so he wasn't able to enter the enclosure but they offered us a full refund for his feeding ticket.  All in all, if you're an animal lover, it's 100% worth the trip.

(Original) We had a wonderful afternoon here with the family. We saw all types of animals and our guide was rich in knowledge and humor. We loved feeding the giraffes. I loaded up on grass fed ground beef and can't wait to try it out. We can't wait to try the glamping experience.

topComments.author: Maia Mosillo
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Uma experi√™ncia realmente incr√≠vel!! Fizemos um saf√°ri em camelo, alimentamos as girafas, l√™mures ringtail e bong√¥s. Voc√™ pode dizer que os animais s√£o bem cuidados com base em sua apar√™ncia e atitude! Os camelos gostavam de se aconchegar e os ringtails tiravam comida de seus dedos da maneira mais gentil!
